name: Alteration Altercation
description:
Play as a wizard defending your tower from the attacking elemental golems!

Change your tower's element to alter your spells and then throw the orbs at the incoming masses.

Remember:
Grass does more damage to Water but less to Fire
Water does more damage to Fire but less to Grass
Fire does more to damage Grass but less to Water

The monsters are spawned in from Twitch chat. Just change the text field to your twitch channel and open the portal!
For a cooler Twitch experience, remember to stream your VR camera as well.
